headline: Assessing AbbVie (ABBV) Valuation After FDA Filing for New Parkinson’s Drug Tavapadon
summary: If you have been following AbbVie (ABBV), the company’s latest move might sway your decision on whether to stick with or jump into the stock. AbbVie just submitted a New Drug Application to the FDA for tavapadon, its potential new treatment for Parkinson’s disease. The submission is backed by strong data from multiple Phase 3 trials. If approved, tavapadon could add diversity to AbbVie’s revenue base as it looks to expand further into neurology. This announcement comes at a time when AbbVie’s...
